function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Limitation of digital proximity in storing user situations may lead to ineffective covid-19 tracking.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Collection of location and personal data by contact tracing apps threatens fundamental human rights.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of transparency in source code for surveillance applications.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High number of false positives in bluetooth tracing apps due to aired bluetooth chips.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limitation of mhealth accessibility due to technical dependency and network connectivity","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Data security and privacy concerns in managing personal health data online","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of accuracy in over-phone contact tracing measurements","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Covid-19 impact on education and training, leading to cancellations and reliance on online technology","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on mobile technology for group counseling and health advice","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Monitoring of covid-19 patients using gps and bluetooth technology in smartphones","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of smartphone technology for diagnosis and imaging may lead to misinterpretation of medical images and misdiagnosis of contagious diseases like covid-19.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased reliance on telemedicine and mobile technology for healthcare consultations may result in inadequate physical examination and assessment of contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of mobile technology for counseling and education may result in misinformation and inadequate guidance on self-isolation and protection from contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases through mobile technology usage in healthcare and social settings","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on mobile technology for healthcare may lead to data breaches and privacy concerns","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential overload of healthcare systems due to increased reliance on mobile technology for diagnosis and treatment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in face-to-face consultations during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased use of smartphone technology for covid-19 data and information updates","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disruption of economic and social wellbeing due to covid-19 impact","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited understanding of variables that increase pandemic difficulty and cause spread of covid-19.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of proactive assessment of future outbreak chances based on current infection and death rates.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient monitoring of mobility and contact data for understanding disease spread during future outbreaks.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of mobile apps for tracking covid-19 transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Gps and bluetooth technology used for tracking covid-19 patients","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Collection and storage of personal health and travel data","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Notification alert for vicinity near red zone based on user location","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for disease transmission through proximity contact","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of misinformation and infodemic through social media","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of traceability and fact-checking in encrypted messaging platforms","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of data security in mobile applications for covid-19 surveillance","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective contact tracing leading to virus transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of transparency and accountability in data administration","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Collection of personal data such as national identity number, passport number, phone number, travel history, and health status.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of gps, wi-fi, and bluetooth to track user’s movements and interactions.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Centralized storage of transaction details, calls, and messages.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Storage of gps history and wi-fi information","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Cross-referencing user’s location with covid-19 patient location","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Open-source code for the application","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on bluetooth technology for proximity tracing","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy concerns related to data collection and storage","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential misuse of app data by unauthorized parties","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of bluetooth low energy for contact tracing","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Storage of contact data on the user’s device","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Retention of contact data on the central server","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Gps location tracking of positive patients","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Monitoring financial transactions, gps location, and cctv footage","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of personal data to all individuals in the area","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Live-location tracking of patients","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Contact tracing and sharing location history and contacts","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Proximity tracking and real-time dashboard of covid-19 cases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"}]}
